title: Drinks from around the world
text:
Drinks from around the world Tue, 08 Sep 2015 11:48 AM Share Your Email Schnapps. Credit: flickr.com/ Holger 
We know of schnapps in Austria and sake in Japan, but what other signature drinks are out there to try during your travels across the globe? 
Fly Abu Dhabi has created a great infographic that serves as an ultimate guide to drinks around the world, giving you ideas on what to drink on your travels. 
The drinks range from the everyday gin, to the more adventurous camel's milk. Would you be brave enough to try the latter? 
There are some entries on the list that we've never heard of, such as lamban√≥g - a coconut flower wine. But they sound pretty interesting. 
Have a look at these and more drinks below: Related Articles
